mapper.delete: delete from feedscrap where user_idx = #{userIdx} and feed_idx = #{feedIdx};
mapper.select: select s.feed_idx, f.user_idx, u.nickname, f.update_date, f.file_idx, ifnull(c.cnt, 0) as comment_count, ifnull(l.cnt, 0) as like_total_count from feedscrap s join mainfeed f on s.feed_idx = f.feed_idx join mainuser u on f.user_idx = u.user_idx left join (select feed_idx, count(*) as cnt from feedcomment group by feed_idx) as c on s.feed_idx = c.feed_idx left join (select feed_idx, count(*) as cnt from feedlike group by feed_idx) as l on s.feed_idx = l.feed_idx where s.user_idx = #{userIdx} and f.is_public = 1 and f.is_deleted = 0;
